title: Best comedy of the year
review: I really wanted to like this movie.There were some scary parts, but the audience laughed during the film. Not a few people, but everybody. The biggest laugh were at the end of the movie. It ruined the feeling. Still it was way much better, than the Haunting.

title: Too boring for an action-fantasy, too ridiculous for a drama
review: This is probably the most overrated movie of all time. I did not like this movie at all. It had absolutely boring dialogs, thin story (could have been told in one hour) and the most unrealistic special effects ever seen. I could never understand those who love this movie.Want to see a true masterpiece? Watch Fight Club!2/10
